snippet.title: Affectus - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Affectus is a cyberpunk stealth-action RPG set in a decadent and sick megalopolis, where the only way to feel good is a drug called Affectus. With no memory, you must unravel the mysteries of your past. Acquire implants, infiltrate, hack, or fight to uncover a vast conspiracy and find a cure to the virus.

If you like what you see, please consider adding the game to your Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478710/Affectus/

SOCIAL MEDIA: 
Follow the evolution of the game on: 
 
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/AffectusGames 
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/affectusgames 
►Website: https://www.affectus.games/ 
►Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478710/Affectus/
